@SkyNews 27 dead in an nhs population of 1.5 million. 0.00002% mortality 
13700 in dead in a uk population of 66.6 million.  0.0002% mortality. 

You are 10 times less likely to die from covid 19 as a member of the nhs than as a member of the general population.
